    • org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configuration中AuthorizationServerTokenServices的使用

      返回AuthorizationServerTokenServices的org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configuration中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected AuthorizationServerTokenServices AuthorizationServerEndpointsConfiguration.AuthorizationServerTokenServicesFactoryBean.createInstance() 
      返回变量类型为AuthorizationServerTokenServices的类型的org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configuration中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<AuthorizationServerTokenServices> AuthorizationServerEndpointsConfiguration.defaultAuthorizationServerTokenServices()
      This needs to be a @Bean so that it can be @Transactional (in case the token store supports them).

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultTokenServices
      Base implementation for token services using random UUID values for the access token and refresh token values.
